thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com | 2 of 120
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text:
I was very impressed by the Pickleball Central
Website and their selection of Paddles and other equipment and accessories.
I called them direct and placed my order over the phone. The woman taking my order is a Pickleball player and answered all my questions and was very pleasant.
Since I am new to this new sport craze I, I was very pleased with their 30 day trial/ return of the paddle!
My paddle arrived ahead of the scheduled delivery time.
My PRO-LITE "APEX" paddle has lots of "pop"
And I'm very happy with it.
I will definitely shop Pickleball Central again!
P.s.Take advantage of their discounted paddles!
- Upper Merion Community Center Complex Pickleball Player
